page.title: 20Sport and Leisure
page.content:
{SPORT >}There is a football team in St Combs,which plays in the local amateur football league. There is also a golf course for all the family to use which lies between the villages of Inverallochy and St. Combs. Badminton is played in the village hall. {
{LEISURE >}For children aged 10_12 there is a youth club.There is a dartboard,snooker,chess,swingball, badminton, pool,unihoc,football and a record player. There is also a swingpark. There is also the W.R.I.and the Senior Citizens Club.There is also plenty of local fishing,sea and river.People also go walking and birdwatching.
